title: Karatedo
brief_description: Action demonstrations of hand to hand combat, women’s self defence, and use of weapons in Karatedo as practised in Japan. Introduced by World Union of Karatedo Organisations President Ryoichi Sasakawa. In Japanese language - no subtitles.
